scripts.start: babel js/scripts.js -d . && minify js/scripts.js > js/scripts.min.js && minify js/settings.js > js/settings.min.js && minify js/conversations.js > js/conversations.min.js && minify css/styles.css > css/styles.min.css
scripts.build: babel js/scripts.js -d . && minify js/scripts.js > js/scripts.min.js && minify js/settings.js > js/settings.min.js && minify js/conversations.js > js/conversations.min.js && minify css/styles.css > css/styles.min.css
scripts.publish: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Feat: Add update and publish package' && git push library main
